reviewText: It's like eating McDonald's, but worse. I thought I was on a prank tv show at first, until they gave me the bill.
“This was such a nice dinner. My grandmother used to make it all the time back in the old days when they were short on money.”
Surpringly really good cakes, for something made from a box.
It's nice to go to places like these so that you can appreciate what you have at home.
I'm glad to have tried it because now I'll know not to eat it again.
Just when I thought that I had gotten used to disappointment, this place somehow proved me wrong.
I've had a nightmare about food like this before. Didn't realized that they actually existed.
I've always wanted to know what overpriced baby food tasted like and now I know.
The best buzzkill you can get.
If you ever wanted inspiration for going on a diet, here it is.
